mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize image sizes for mobile to improve loading times and responsiveness.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider enabling lazy loading for images and assets to improve load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta descriptions and alt texts for images to enhance SEO visibility.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps required to complete a reservation.
tips: Consider integrating a live chat option for better customer support.
Ensure all links are functional and lead to relevant pages.
